name: One direction (EasterEggStudios)
description:
Its a simple hyper-casual Android game. We need to match the direction of enemy blocks to score points... It becomes fast as the game progress....

Controls....

Swipe to change direction of player...

Gameplay

Match the direction of red blocks....

Match reverse direction of purple blocks...

Each matched block gives you a point....

It becomes very fast as we go...

It a prototype (Minimum Viable Product ). Development is in progress want to make something good enough to ship into play store...

Things want to add.

1. High Score.

2. Music.

3. Good Art.

4. Monetisation.

5. Nice and Intuitive UI.
